info.title: BalleBaazi 2.0 Apis
info.description:
# Introduction
BalleBaazi 2.0 apis on nodejs

# Overview
Common header must be passed in every api request


# Authentication
Brrar authentication is applied

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?
Success: 200,
Error: 400,
Max otp attempts: 401,
Token_expired: 800,
Not_found: 404,
Unauthorized_user: 401

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?
